backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping report detailing implemented Valentine UI features and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all frontend Valentine components and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with extensive CSS variables for light/dark theming and color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML mounting point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component toggling between Screen1 and Screen2 with decorative background and footer.
frontend/src/components/valentine/DecorB: Fixed pastel gradient background with tiled heart doodle overlay.
frontend/src/components/valentine/GiftOv: Modal wrapper with blurred backdrop, close button, and animated gradient container.
frontend/src/components/valentine/gifts/: Gift view displaying bouquet image, floating hearts, and four animated message bubbles.
Renders a decorative love-letter view with sparkles, floating hearts, and styled romantic text.
Displays a heart-burst animation with confetti and Valentine's Day messages and bouncing hearts.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Screen: Initial screen with stickers, Valentine prompt, YES CTA, and evasive NO button behavior.
Second screen showing heart character, headline, and three clickable gift cards opening overlays.
frontend/src/components/valentine/useEva: Provides logic to randomly reposition a button when hovered or touched, using container and button refs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because the Valentine app uses no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and custom animations like pulse, bounce, pop-in, float-heart, and twinkle.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s versioned state for a kawaii Valentine’s single‑page site, including UI flow notes, required image assets, and implemented interactive features. Describes responsive behavior, evasive button logic, and celebration screens.
